body:
i’m thankful that this morning, i read this cute tweet (

[https://twitter.com/doodlingglass/status/1111279995350122496?s=21](https://twitter.com/doodlingglass/status/1111279995350122496?s=21)) and gently chuckled, clicking through the cute included images, but i’m even more thankful that tonight after dinner i saw this quote tweet (

[https://twitter.com/alex\_but\_online/status/1112415299058520065?s=21](https://twitter.com/alex_but_online/status/1112415299058520065?s=21)

), which made me belly laugh and present the tweets to d, who did the same
